Date: 2025-01-17 18:19
Subject: NOMINATE NOW! FW: Bravo Awards 2024
--------------------------------------------------
Dear team,

 

Good day!

 

You may have noticed the announcement of Bravo Awards for H2 2024. Since the window for submission is short, I wanted to remind you to not miss out on the opportunity in recognising your star team members or teams.

 

PS: While submitting them, please ensure there is enough qualitative information and write up with supporting evidences.

 

Link to nomination form: Nominate <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3DTDD4bnvzpUKlaQp9gkn787o7UlgSTlNDpJqP26OrDN1UQ1ZWNUFNQzU5VE5TRU42MzNHOUpFNFZENy4u&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C16751a7379474807393c08dd37020254%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638727203956421585%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Mx958dck68HXmW532CScky9qUFul1zUt1tP2ueh2Kw8%3D&reserved=0>  

 

Kind regards,

 

SABITHA MENON​​​​

PEOPLE PARTNER

REAL FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

CAREERS.CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <https://careers.chalhoubgroup.com/> 


 <https://twitter.com/ChalhoubGroup> 

 <https://www.facebook.com/chalhoubgroup/>

 <https://www.glassdoor.com/Overview/Working-at-Chalhoub-Group-EI_IE499602.11,25.htm> 



From: Country Management <Country.management@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, 15 January 2025 4:58 PM
Subject: Bravo Awards 2024

 



 

	Dear team,
  
Happy new year!
  
In recognition of your valuable contributions to the success of our team and the Group, I am happy to announce the Bravo Awards <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fcontent%2Fbravo-awards-1&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C16751a7379474807393c08dd37020254%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638727203956454244%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=q4SIQBZNPjWb34L9s7RVsmQooXwsMNmcPn9exQozruU%3D&reserved=0>  are back! Let's celebrate those who go above and beyond to make the impossible possible, create magic and delight customers at every given opportunity.
 
Bravo is a recognition programme that aims to identify and shine the spotlight on the stars of our teams as well as showcase and encourage noteworthy contributions, milestones, and achievements. 
 
It's time to nominate <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3DTDD4bnvzpUKlaQp9gkn787o7UlgSTlNDpJqP26OrDN1UQ1ZWNUFNQzU5VE5TRU42MzNHOUpFNFZENy4u&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C16751a7379474807393c08dd37020254%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638727203956477118%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=hxsYtOmIwJ9gNFDjcGKWmo9R6zYUJi3%2FzyHJi9MYFBk%3D&reserved=0>  the stars who deserve to shine!

B0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=hxsYtOmIwJ9gNFDjcGKWmo9R6zYUJi3%2FzyHJi9MYFBk%3D&reserved=0>  the stars who deserve to shine! Nominations are open to both individuals and teams until 24 Jan 2025.
 
Kind Regards,
 
Fadi Jabbour

 

	 

،أعضاء الفريق الأعزاء 

كل عام وأنتم بخير بمناسبة العام الجديد!

تقديرًا لإسهاماتكم القيّمة في نجاح فريقنا والمجموعة، يسرني أن أعلن عن عودة جوائز براڤو! دعونا نحتفل بأولئك الذين يبذلون قصارى جهدهم لتحقيق المستحيل، وخلق لحظات مميزة، وإسعاد العملاء في كل فرصة تتاح لهم.

براڤو هو برنامج تقدير يهدف إلى تسليط الضوء على النجوم في فرقنا وتشجيع الإسهامات والإنجازات المتميزة والمعالم البارزة.

حان الوقت لترشيح <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3DTDD4bnvzpUKlaQp9gkn787o7UlgSTlNDpJqP26OrDN1UQ1ZWNUFNQzU5VE5TRU42MzNHOUpFNFZENy4u&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C16751a7379474807393c08dd37020254%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638727203956496991%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=S4t8DC2vFSrWr99WDjtPCcK8h17eDo74%2FArdJf6Xlm8%3D&reserved=0>  النجوم الذين يستحقون التألق! الترشيحات مفتوحة للأفراد والفرق حتى ٢٤ يناير

 
تحياتي،
فادي جبّور
